mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Image (image_uuid, image_original_name, image_name, image_extension_name, image_real_path, image_access_path, image_size, image_type, uploaded_by, uploaded_at, status) VALUES (#{imageUuid}, #{imageOriginalName}, #{imageName}, #{imageExtensionName}, #{imageRealPath}, #{imageAccessPath}, #{imageSize}, #{imageType}, #{uploadedBy}, #{uploadedAt}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE Image SET image_original_name = #{imageOriginalName}, image_name = #{imageName}, image_extension_name = #{imageExtensionName}, image_real_path = #{imageRealPath}, image_access_path = #{imageAccessPath}, image_size = #{imageSize}, image_type = #{imageType}, uploaded_by = #{uploadedBy}, uploaded_at = #{uploadedAt}, status = #{status} WHERE image_uuid = #{imageUuid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Image WHERE image_uuid = #{imageUuid} AND status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM Image WHERE image_type = #{imageType} AND status = TRUE
